text: Ruffs Dale, Pennsylvania, also spelled Ruffsdale, is an unincorporated community in East Huntingdon Township, Westmoreland County, Pennsylvania, that is about forty miles from Pittsburgh. The zip code is 15679. There is a school that is part of Southmoreland School District, but the majority of Ruffs Dale lies within Yough School District. Nearby Communities: * Hunker: 3 miles * New Stanton: 5 miles * Mt. Pleasant: 9 miles * Scottdale: 7 miles * West Newton: 8 miles * Tarrs: 4 miles Category:Unincorporated communities in Pennsylvania Category:Unincorporated communities in Westmoreland County, Pennsylvania Category:Pittsburgh metropolitan area
title: Ruffs Dale, Pennsylvania
